00020 #include <sstream>
00021 #include "binarywriter.h"
00022 
00023 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Binary {
00024             
00025         BinaryWriter::Context & BinaryWriter::context() throw(WritingException) {
00026             if(!stack.size()) throwIt("Empty stack.");
00027             return (stack.back());
00028         }
00029         
00030         void BinaryWriter::startWriting(cstr myClassName, unsigned char version)throw(WritingException) {
00031             Context c; 
00032             c.state = Context::StartWriting;
00033             c.sw_className=myClassName;
00034             c.sw_version = version;
00035             stack.push_back(c);
00036         }
00037         
00038         void BinaryWriter::doneWriting()throw(WritingException) {
00039             if(context().state != Context::StartWriting) {
00040                 throwIt("doneWriting(): called not in context StartWriting.");  
00041             }
00042             std::string objectClassName = context().sw_className;
00043             Buffer objectPayload = context().payload;
00044             unsigned char version = context().sw_version;
00045             stack.pop_back();
00046             
00047             if(context().state == Context::WriteObject) {
00048                 context().wo_className = objectClassName;
00049                 context().wo_version = version;
00050                 context().payload = objectPayload;
00051             } else throwIt("doneWriting(): expected previous context to be WriteObject");
00052         }
00053         
00054         void BinaryWriter::throwIt(std::string error) throw (WritingException) {
00055                 throw WritingException(error+'\n'+printStackTrace());   
00056         }
00057         
00058         void BinaryWriter::appendBuffer(const Buffer& b) throw(WritingException) {
00059             if(!stack.size()) throwIt("Empty stack.");
00060             
00061             (stack.back()).payload.append(b);
00062         }
00063         
00064         
00065         void BinaryWriter::writeObject( bool needClassName, const Writable*w, cstr name) 
00066             throw(WritingException) {
00067             Context c; 
00068             c.state = Context::WriteObject;
00069             stack.push_back(c);
00070                     w->write(this);
00071             Buffer className = context().wo_className;
00072             unsigned char version = context().wo_version;
00073             Buffer payload = context().payload;
00074             stack.pop_back();
00075                     
00076             if(needClassName)
00077             appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_objectWithClass(className, version, payload)));
00078             else
00079             appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_objectWithoutClass(payload)));
00080         }
00081         
00082         Buffer BinaryWriter::serialize(bool withClassName, const Writable*w) {
00083             Context c; 
00084             c.state = Context::Serialize;
00085             stack.push_back(c);
00086                 writeObject(withClassName, w);
00087             Buffer b = context().payload;
00088             stack.pop_back();
00089             return b;
00090         }
00091 
00092         std::string BinaryWriter::printStackTrace() {
00093             ostringstream oss;
00094             oss << "Stack size: " << stack.size() << endl;
00095             for (int i=0;i<(int)stack.size();i++) {
00096                 oss << "\t " << i << ". " << stack[i].describe() << std::endl;  
00097             }
00098             return oss.str();
00099         }
00100         
00101         std::string BinaryWriter::Context::describe() {
00102             switch(state) {
00103                 case(WriteObject): 
00104                     return string("WriteObject, className=")+wo_className;
00105                 
00106                 case(StartWriting):
00107                     return string("StartWriting, className=")+sw_className;
00108 
00109                 case(Serialize):
00110                     return "Serialize";
00111 
00112                 case(ObjectArray):
00113                     return "ObjectArray, current objects = XXX";
00114 
00115                 default: 
00116                     return "Unknown state.";
00117             }
00118         }
